phrases: Anyway, she is a shy girl.
She makes you want to cheer her on.
For some reason, everyone is afraid of me.
I mean, even her name is Sadako, like from Ringu.
Her parents gave her a pretty blunt name, huh?
I wish I could just fit in.
Kazehaya-kun is the exact opposite of me.
Everyone flocks around him and forms a clique.
At the opening ceremony when I came to high school...
If you are heading to Kitahoro High School, it is that way.
People only ever apologize to me.
But he smiled and thanked me.
I want to become like him someday.
Unpopular Sawako, on the other hand...
Yuka sat in Sadako's seat and stayed home sick for a week.
Nothing will happen if you sit there.
I do not have any psychic aura or anything either.
I hope I can become good friends with the person next to me this time.
It sort of sucks that I have no one to share my joy and sadness with at times like this.
Yay, I am next to you.
No thanks, do not need one.
I am so happy, from the bottom of my heart!
I am filled with feelings that I never even knew of, until then.
I want to hold on to them,
like the first gifts of my life.
She finally fits in with her class, huh?
Yeah, but it did not last.
I am asking you who told you that.
that she is using Kazehaya and you two to up her status.
But I am glad you made some friends.
Those black rumors about Yano and Yoshida are really something though.
That is why they were down.
It is because she is wandering around.
Kazehaya's going to become seriously worthless too, if he keeps getting followed around by Sadako.
I am going to hurt them again if I stay near them.
And they are such nice people.
I may be able to stop the rumors, but I do not know how to make them feel better.
So I am going to go back to what it was like, before I got used to being around them.
That has to be the best thing to do.
You would be surprised how positive-thinking she is.
Now who do you think is the most frustrated?
If you do not hate me, why are you avoiding me?
So you were being awkward because of the rumors about Yano and Yoshida.
What if it were the other way around?
If Yano or I avoided you, thinking we would ruin your reputation.
I would want to stay together.
That might be how they are feeling.
So it is all about how the other person feels.
His simple words, his smiles... they always nudge me forward.
Hey, come on, do not ruin the story.
After the love story though, what happens next?
Your son's going to be sad if he saw.
She has to make use of it.
You do not need to get off my back.
You people do not get it.
You do not know how kind they were to me.
How I more than just like them...
You are still sticking up for her,
after all those rumors she spread?
It is our problem, so piss off.
I want to be friends with you two.
Becoming friends happens before you know it.
Yuka's really liked Kazehaya since middle school.
Of course he is going to hate you for that.
There've been lots of rumors about Sadako lately.
I remember seeing her with Kazehaya.
I wonder if they are going out?
I can imagine him liking her.
Huh, you are in the sports day committee too?
That album I lent you before the last one
My bad, what were you saying?
That CD before the one I lent you.
Okay, I will bring it next time.
So then, when the pass comes this way, you go straight
I made a new friend again.
Honestly, it is not like I put in any effort, so I do not know what to think.
I guess this is what it is like to make friends.
It has not really hit me, but I still feel happy.
You old geezers do not know how she feels.
She is been watching someone the whole time.
You know, there is someone I like.
I want you to help me.
Kazehaya is the one I like.
Is there going to be someone special for Kazehaya-kun?
I have to help make that happen?
I do not think I can.
I cannot cheer for you honestly, so I cannot help you.
I think Kazehaya-kun is special to me.
Because he was nice to you?
Because he was kind to you?
It does not even have to be Kazehaya, as long as they are nice to you, does it?
So that is what she was trying to do.
And now she is taking note of Kazehaya, because of Kurumi.
Is not this what it means to like someone?
This feeling I have towards Kazehaya-kun.
I just realized, we can talk about love together.
That rumor from in the washroom,
Sawako, it was Kurumi that made you suffer so much.
I have never thought of you as a friend.
You have to tell Kazehaya about me, do not you?
Get him to feel sorry for you again.
do you think Sawako felt better after that?
Do not you think she wanted to say something?
That is what I came here to tell you earlier.
I said you are in my way.
You are always with Kazehaya, and you do not even have to try.
I thought I could win against you.
Because I am a lot more in love with him.
I think you are cuter now than when I first met you.
I know he does not like me.
I have always been watching him.
I cannot make myself think of anyone else more than her.
Are you at least a little happy that I confessed to you?
They both have the same feelings towards the same person.
If by any crazy fluke things work out between you two,
I am never going to congratulate you.
I hate any woman that Kazehaya likes.
We cannot be friends, can we?
